attributes.action: Address homelessness once and for all . Too many are suffering
attributes.additional_details: All your evidence is all around you every where you go, just pop to the shop or on the way to work ,just look up and I bet you see more than one person suffering at the hands of councils not working properly or running properly
attributes.background: We recently took some food out to the homeless . Most are just normal people who used to hold jobs ,houses,kids and family. Todays world is to hard for people with low or no income to cope. We met elderly ill people living on the streets. This can be sorted and should be with immediate affect!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining how you would like the Government to address homelessness.
